description: {"blocks":[{"key":"649kj","text":"Wastewater epidemiology is a method used to study the diseases affecting a population. Conventional methods of wastewater collection for composite samples have involved the usage of autosamplers that require installation in sewers with appropriate expertise and certification. Tampon-based wastewater sampling is a cost-effective and simple way to collect wastewater to study microbial pathogens. It is also a safer alternative as tampons can be deployed and retrieved without opening manhole covers. In this protocol we detail a wastewater sampling strategy using tampons to obtain composite samples. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckd54","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh2i5","text":"Next, wastewater-based epidemiology has predominantly been targeted, where scientists have looked for specific pathogens and use biomarkers for the same. Notably, traditional wastewater filtration methods (i.e. skim milk filtrations and membrane filtration) require large sample sizes with varying nucleic acid yields (Ahmed 2022). Recently, Nanotrap‱ technology has been shown to have a higher nucleic acid yield using a smaller sample size when compared to traditional membrane filtration techniques, making it a better tool for scientists to concentrate microbial nucleic acids in wastewater for wastewater epidemiology. Specifically, the Ceres Nanotrap‱ technology was developed to trace severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS-CoV-2) in public wastewater and Nanotrap‱ particles have been used specifically to track viral pathogenic shedding in wastewater of: Endogenous pepper mottle virus (PMMoV), Influenza A, CrAssphage, and monkey pox. However, there is little known about the success rates of different downstream analysis techniques to concentrate microbes in wastewater in an untargeted fashion. Therefore, it remains unclear whether one method will work better than the other if one were to be interested in characterizing the microbial community composition and abundance in a wastewater sample. To this end, in this protocol we detail a wastewater processing method involving Ceres Nanotrap‱ technology and NucleoMag‱ RNA Water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":350,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":656,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":772,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":1406,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":1432,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"65AD5B2BF39011EEA7E70A58A9FEAC02","name":":copyright:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"65AD5B2BF39011EEA7E70A58A9FEAC02","name":":copyright:"}},"2":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"65AD5B2BF39011EEA7E70A58A9FEAC02","name":":copyright:"}},"3":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"65AD5B2BF39011EEA7E70A58A9FEAC02","name":":copyright:"}},"4":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"65AD5B2BF39011EEA7E70A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

fork_info.title: SARS-CoV-2 Wastewater RNA Concentration and Extraction (Nanotrap® and NucleoMag® RNA Water)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8tffd","text":"Collect   of wastewater in a 500mL or 1L plastic sample bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"jpuop","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dm6qb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","guid":"2944ABB0192611EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"04019487344B11EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":593,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"9736s\",\"text\":\"500mL of wastewater collected in 500mL plastic bottles.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drnzbft2f.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drnxbft2f.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/drnybft2f.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drnwbft2f.webp","width":445}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qcsb","text":"Create a 1:100 dilution of Zoetis Bovine Rhinotracheitis-Parainfluzena-Respiratory Syncytial Virus (BRSV) Vaccine in H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":79},{"style":"sub","offset":118,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahdad","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4765t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpett","text":"Spike the  wastewater sample with   of 1:100 BSRV to achieve a 1µL/mL concentration of 1:100 BSRV.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":87,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cjolk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6mljd","text":"","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jvhk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7j7i9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","guid":"1B1143A0192611EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","guid":"221475F0192611EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"19vb5","text":"This can be applied to wastewater samples greater or less than 500mL, as long as a 1µL/mL concentration is achieved.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"64k9t","text":"Mix the added 1:100 BRSV into the wastewater sample by aggressively inverting the bottle several times or shaking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cag5q","text":"Incubate spiked wastewater samples for a minimum of   at room temperature (RT) to allow large aggregates to sediment at the bottom of the sample bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1imdb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3r2dh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"580ADA50192611EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nvbe","text":"Use a 25mL serological pipette to transfer top   of spiked wastewater to a 50mL conical tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"det7r","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"nkm4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jll42","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"kr8f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"40","guid":"6726CDA0192611EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":13,"style":"bold"},{"length":3,"offset":38,"style":"bold"}],"key":"9bu2f","text":"Make sure to gently transfer from the top of the wastewater sample as to not disturb the sedimented particles at the bottom of the bottle.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"04080EC4344B11EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":733,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"7hs4c\",\"text\":\"Transferring 40mL of spiked and settled wastewater samples from 500mL bottles to 50mL conical tubes.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_0939.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/private/a639e575cf523ad50eabf4d55581bfdcb61b480eb33cdb43913a71cab7b9e272/ctbfbft2f.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drn3bft2f.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drn2bft2f.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fs12","text":"Add of Ceres Magnetic Nanotrap® particles to the    spiked wastewater aliquot.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e197s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"600","guid":"79DA8DB0192611EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"40","guid":"70D1C760192611EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmedo","text":"Place conical tubes into custom magnet racks and allow magnets to attract Magnetic Nanotrap® particles for a minimum of 20 minutes at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q9c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eyplf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"mkhwf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"acth6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3v16j","text":"The samples should be allowed to sit on the magnets long enough so that the supernatant is relatively clear. Some wastewater samples may be too turbid to reach this point, however.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"040AFBFB344B11EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":733,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"3bakp\",\"text\":\"Conical tubes with wastewater samples after incubation on magnets. Notice the rust-red Magnetic Nanotrap particles that have precipitated at the bottom of the tubes near the magnets.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_0944.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/private/a639e575cf523ad50eabf4d55581bfdcb61b480eb33cdb43913a71cab7b9e272/ctbgbft2f.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drn5bft2f.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drn4bft2f.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"040AFDB8344B11EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":733,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"ljb9\",\"text\":\"Wastewater sample with Magnetic Nanotrap particles completely out of solution following magnet incubation.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/public/a639e575cf523ad50eabf4d55581bfdcb61b480eb33cdb43913a71cab7b9e272/ctbhbft2f.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drn7bft2f.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drn6bft2f.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mqc5","text":"Keeping the conical tubes fixed to the magnets, pour off the supernatant carefully as to not disturb the pellet of Magnetic Nanotrap® particles at the bottom of the conical tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gv7n","text":"Add   of Buffer MWA1 to the falcon tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bfdpf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","guid":"97E0B4F0193111EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f96dd","text":"Vortex to resuspend the Magnetic Nanotrap® pellets in the Buffer MWA1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"hdk9","text":"Incubate samples for   at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3cga3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"AE9435E0193211EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21uqi","text":"With the tubes on the magnets, transfer   of lysate to a 2mL deep well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5rh4a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ytsur","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eu0jp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"450","guid":"C7F9B7AD193211EB95740A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cact3","text":"Use barcode labels on the falcon tubes to transfer sample ID's to a LIMS program when transferring lysate to the deep well plate.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"04B09C8C344B11EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":733,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"be1bj\",\"text\":\"Transferring lysate to a 2mL deep well plate for RNA extraction. Columns not being used in the current extraction run are sealed using non-pierceable foil.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Image from iOS.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/private/a639e575cf523ad50eabf4d55581bfdcb61b480eb33cdb43913a71cab7b9e272/ctbjbft2f.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drn9bft2f.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/drn8bft2f.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"371p8","text":"Place plate on shaker at   for approximately 30 minutes to allow beads to air dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cnasf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9nrog","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n79u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BD35D6D0193711EB88FD5BEC09CBC4D1","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":72,"style":"bold"},{"length":4,"offset":79,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3kn4d","text":"Ensure beads are thoroughly dry before proceeding, carry over EtOH from Buffer MWA4 can ruin downstream experiments.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
